like:
- Syncs up well with our CRM (Hubspot) with good break down of attainment.
- Ability to add notes for forecast submissions.
- We use a Hybrid Model, and I think the layout facilitates the 2-pronged forecast very well. It's clear.
- Great data on your performance as a rep and deal velocity / avg size etc.
dislike: - At times there is a bit of a delay when changing deal details for them to appear in my forecast.
problems solved:
- Kluster solves the problem of calculating my own forecast from my CRM which is a cumbersome task.
- By syncing with our CRM it avoids having to do any manul input (even if at times that sync is little slow).
- It's hard to understand the granular info on your performance as a rep just from the CRM, but Kluster does this on our behalf and makes it super clear.
- We have a blend of new business and growth deals that contribute to our target, forecasting for both on CRM would not be as clear as it currently is on Kluster.

like: Kluster provides insight on my monthly target attainment. It also allows me to track my development, with many different aspects taken into account (win-rate, sales-cycle duration, average deal-size, to name a few).
dislike: I would love for Kluster to be more customizable in terms of dashboards to view my statistics. It is good now, I also like the improvement since I started using Kluster. With our setup, we use color-schemes to code how urgent it is to work on certain deals. I don't know exactly what the colors in Kluster mean, but would love to have a guide on that, and the layout in general. Maybe some help to understand inside the dashboards.
problems solved: It gives an overview of how im trailing towards my monthly target, and solves the problem of not having tangible goals for improving in my career, by providing specific numbers on my performance. Also helps me balance my efforts, since I work with both new clients, and upselling of existing clients.

like:
Incredible in-app support via live chat!!
Kluster vision and the breakdown of key sales metrics such as avg. deal size, time to close and sales cycle analysis is really useful for accurately forcasting future attainment and required pipeline coverage.
dislike: Some teething problems with access and slow loading speeds at certain times. Some bugs resulting in missing deals or incorrect values
problems solved:
Forecasting was previously a pain, now it's really simple for users to see an overview of all open deals, track their potential and quickly spot deals that are stalling.
Time spent forcasting has been cut in half, allowing more time to analyse previous performance and set steps to improve performance using the key metrics available on Kluster.

like: We moved to Kluster to help solve our issues with forecasting, which we were previously doing in an alternative platform. Now we have a standardised and clear view of the full teams forecast, manual and AI. The calls we are making are 95-98% accurate, the platform has been brilliant.
dislike: Software can be a little bloated with so many views, but when build what you want it is great.
problems solved: It's helping us with our forecasting and accuracy in forecasting on a monthly and quarterly view. It is also helping with pacing for month or quarter.

like: Kluster has improved my sales forecasting and target attainment with clear and actionable insights into key metrics like win-rate, average deal size, sales cycle duration. Helps make data-driven decisions and plan strategically. The in-app support is excellent, and the visual representation of performance and trends, along with useful filtering tools, makes it easy to track progress and stay focused on key goals. Overall, Kluster is insightful, user-friendly and with great support!
dislike: Might be due to implementation, but the breakdown of FC isn't as we have it internally, so not sure if it's a limitation of the product. Slow loading speeds at certain times. Some syncing bugs resulting in missing deals or incorrect values.
problems solved: Sales forecasting and tsrget attaintment.

like: It's automation in taking into consideration historic sales performance to determine what we need pipeline wise to hit future goals
dislike: nothing comes to mind, every sales team should use it to be better at forecasting
problems solved: Forecasting is challenging, many things affect our ability to forecast effectively. But Kluster and its AI tool are routinely on the money when it comes to telling us how long deals will take, what the health of the deal is and how much pipeline we need to close what we need to hit targets.

like: It is easy to use and it gives us good analysis and different charts to evaluate our work.
dislike: Takes a bit too much time to sync with Hubspot, the layout is not great also.
problems solved: To speed up my forecast and help visualise my deals in a clear way.

like: Great insights if I know where to find them. The emojis are helpful for eyeballing things.
dislike: Lenses are confusing, and I just really have a tough time tracking down the data I'm looking for. I feel like everything takes more clicks than should be necessary.
problems solved: Finding forecast data in one place is helpful, but again - the UI makes it tough to find what I'm looking for, and it can be easy to mistakenly look at data under the wrong lens.

like: In a very easily structured dashboard, you have all key metrics and numbers at a glance.
dislike: Forecasting tool is easy to use and intuitive. If I really had to give a suggestion, I would let the user leave the forecasting dashboard once the submission has been done, as of now I alwasy feel that something went wrong with the submission and I click multiple times on the submission button :-)
problems solved: Above all forecasting and quarterly data collection for business review

like: Dashboard features, pipeline and the ability to push and pull data to and from CRM
dislike: Often issues with integrations and data from i.e. HubSpot.
problems solved: Pipeline management and easy pushing of data to and from hubspot

like: The accuracty for the calls it is able to make. It is brilliant for segmenting our different divisions and regions and gives us clear view an extremely accurate forecast roll-up. We can make calls many future months in advance.
dislike: A lot of bloat, but might be useful if we had further adoption outstanding the forecasting.
problems solved: We are using kluster to help with forecasting.

like:
Kluster is quite perceptive and gives usable insights, providing easy access and practical applicability. The filtering tools enables me, as a user, to have access to a detailed examination of data points.

The visual representation of performance and trends is impressive, which supports prompt directional advice for the sales department. This function keeps my targets in prominent view, fostering an environment conducive to reaching our goals.

My capability of forecasting accurately as increased a lot since I started using Kluster's insights. Having visibility into the forecast and obtaining immediate insights on your sales pipeline enables proactive strategizing for the necessary actions each quarter to achieve your targets, ensuring that every quarter is optimally planned for success.
dislike: Not necessarily a bad thing but for me, as a user, sometimes it is a bit  overwhelming.
problems solved: Helping me to better keep track of my pipeline and forecasting. Knowing exactly where I should focus my attention and having that right in front of me and well organized is a most.

like:
Kluster excels at providing insightful data that is not only accessible but also readily actionable. The platform allows for an in-depth exploration of specific data points, thanks to its robust filtering capabilities. This feature is immensely beneficial as it enables us to hone in on precise information relevant to our needs.

Moreover, the ability to set and monitor targets is a game-changer. It offers a clear, at-a-glance view of our current standing, facilitating effective and immediate guidance for our Sales team. This feature ensures that our objectives are always in focus, enhancing our team's ability to achieve them.

Additionally, Kluster's capability to track performance over time is invaluable. It offers a comprehensive overview of our progress, helping us to identify whether we are on the right path towards our goals or if there are emerging challenges that require our attention. This longitudinal data is critical for strategic planning, as it empowers us to make informed decisions based on trends and patterns in our performance.

The support we are receiving is great, they are very reactive and always find ways to make things work.
dislike:
As a Saas we are using different products and ARR as a financial metric.
Sometimes is not that easy to manage those two and get all the insights that this tool allow but we managed to find some work around
problems solved:
Kluster is giving me the insights I'm looking for to drive my sales strategy and make sure the team is on track to achieve the objective.
I'm also using it to look at specific countries, type of companies or sales performance over time

like: Kluster is an invaluable tool for Account Executives seeking data-driven insights and forecasts for sales performance. Its real-time data aggregation and customizable dashboards provide a clear view of KPIs, making it easy to monitor team progress and assess sales strategies.
dislike: One area where Kluster could improve is in the flexibility of its forecasting module. While it generates forecasts effectively, it could benefit from more advanced predictive modeling options, allowing for better customization and adaptation to unique business needs, especially in dynamic markets.
problems solved: Kluster is effectively solving the problem of sales performance analysis and forecasting. By providing real-time data aggregation and customizable dashboards, it helps me and my sales team keep a close eye on our KPIs, track individual and team progress, and evaluate the effectiveness of our sales strategies. This benefit is crucial because it enables us to make data-driven decisions and adjustments, ultimately leading to improved sales outcomes and goal achievement. Additionally, while there is room for improvement in its forecasting module, Kluster still helps us anticipate potential trends and challenges in our sales pipeline, giving us an edge in adapting to market dynamics. In summary, Kluster's ability to tackle these problems positively impacts our sales performance and decision-making processes.

like: It's easy to see my progress towards my monthly target and separate between sales led growth and organic. Also it's a good reminder to see the deals that are overdue and gives me a reminder to follow up.
dislike: You can't see the deals that have been closed, it would be great if you also could see each deal that have ended up in closed won to better track what deals you've been working on. Also the UX is sometimes a bit complicated and I think irt would be great if you could adjust the dahsboard overview a bit more.
problems solved: Helping me keep track of my pipeline and how I work towards my target. It also reminds me of deals that are overdue or supposed to be closed in the current month, which helps me focus on the most relevant deals.

like: The visuals make it easy to navigate and see what you need to see.
dislike: Feels like there are too many dashboards when realistically you only use 2 or 3 on a regular basis.
problems solved: Kluster is giving us forecasting trends and patterns that we can't get manually.

like: Forecasting simplicity is key to Kuster success
dislike: Feels quite kluky as a software - works fine but UI/UX is klunky.
problems solved: It helps bring all forecast history and provide more accuracte forecast than what is just in pipeline. Also help identify pipeline trends in simple format.

like: I like the pipeline news feed and the fact that gives you insights on what actions to take.
dislike: Sometimes it is a bit slow in projecting data from CRM.
problems solved: I am able to easily scroll through my pipeline and understand the stage of each deal in detail.

like:
Kluster has been a great addition to our toolkit at Pleo, offering insightful sales analytics and reliable forecasting. The platform is user-friendly, which has allowed me to quickly adapt and move from Hubspot forecasting to Kluster.

There's a bit of a snag when it comes to the HubSpot integration, thoughâ€”it's generally smooth but can hit a few bumps with data sync now and again. Nothing that can't be managed, but worth a mention for those looking for seamless integration.

All in all, Kluster meets our high expectations with only a minor hiccup along the way. A solid choice for any sales teams.

like:
Very clean pipeline management and overview of deals

Pipeline managment and visibilty for both reps and managers

gives me greater insights on why I lose and win and when it happens

like: Being able to see your forecast and get real-time insights on your funnel allows you to actively plan what needs to be done each quarter to hit your numbers. Having data back up how you performed in the past allows you to get a better understanding of what is needed to win each quarter.

like:

like: Kluster allows me to keep track of my monthly targets which inlcude, pipeline build, meetings booked  and closed won. like: My leadership team requires that I submit a weekly forecast, and I use Kluster to provide them the information they're looking for. like:

like: Having used Kluster for 6+ months now, as an admin user, I am extremely happy with the product. problems solved: Keeping up to date on team's forecasts and identifying gaps in our sales processes - flagging what deals need more attention & what deal stages are leading to the most leakages in our pipe.

like: The ability for users to customise Kluster to meet their specific sales targets. I am able to tailor Kluster month-to-month to ensure I am able to hit my own sales targets.

This is key in allowing me to succeed in my job role. I have used tools before that do NOT provide the same valuable insight that Kluster does.

like:

like: I love the full line of sight into quarter by quarter progress. It allows me to stay up to date as an IC on where I am tracking and how my peers are also doing against their goals. It took almost no time to know how to use and I'd recommend Kluster to any sales org.

like:
Kluster offers an unparalleled advantage by providing a comprehensive overview of your entire pipeline, offering a detailed insight into the intricate stages of each deal. Understanding the precise count of deals at various stages is a pivotal aspect, enabling a clear understanding of the pipeline's health. This visibility allows you to identify bottlenecks where deals may be stagnating or facing obstacles, and equally crucial, pinpoint deals that have the potential to slip away. Addressing these potential drawbacks in a proactive manner is of paramount importance to keep the pipeline flowing smoothly and maintain a positive momentum.

What truly sets Kluster apart is the attention to detail in addressing both positive and negative aspects of your deals. The sophisticated dashboard is a standout feature, presenting a visual representation of your committed and best-case deals. This dashboard not only offers clarity but also allows for easy customization and interaction. The ability to mark these deals with icons and swiftly move them back and forth within the dashboard further enhances the user experience, enabling seamless and real-time management of your sales pipeline. The power to swiftly adapt and respond to changes, backed by this intuitive interface, is a testament to Kluster's commitment to facilitating efficient and effective pipeline management.
dislike:
Thus far, our experience with Kluster has been overwhelmingly positive, with no major concerns to report. The only minor inconvenience we've encountered is a slight overlap in functionalities with some of the other forecasting tools currently in our toolkit. While this doesn't diminish Kluster's effectiveness, it does prompt us to reevaluate our existing array of tools and streamline our processes.

As we conduct this evaluation and potentially trim down our toolset for optimal efficiency, we can foresee a scenario where Kluster will increasingly become our go-to solution for managing and analyzing crucial aspects of our operations. Its robust features and user-friendly interface make it a promising candidate for centralizing our forecasting efforts. By consolidating our tools and utilizing Kluster's comprehensive capabilities, we anticipate a more streamlined and cohesive approach to our forecasting and decision-making processes, thereby maximizing the value and potential that Kluster offers.
problems solved: The seamless integration of our CRM (Hubspot) functionality and simplified forecasting analytics has drastically enhanced our operational processes. Since integrating Kluster into our workflows, our precision in forecasting has notably improved, leading to greater efficiency in our forecasting procedures, revenue planning, and strategic team sessions.

like: Kluster is a powerful team collaboration platform that aims to streamline and optimize project management and communication processes. With its impressive array of features and intuitive interface, Kluster provides a comprehensive solution for businesses seeking to enhance teamwork and productivity. Having extensively used Kluster for several projects, I can confidently say that it has proven to be a valuable asset in maximizing our team's efficiency.
dislike: One dislike of Kluster is its lack of advanced customization options. While the platform offers a range of features that cater to general project management needs, it may fall short for businesses with unique or specific requirements.
problems solved:
Kluster is primarily solving the problem of scattered communication and inefficient project management. Before using Kluster, our team faced challenges with fragmented communication channels, missed deadlines, and difficulty in tracking project progress. Kluster has provided a centralized platform that brings all team communication and project management tools together, eliminating the need for multiple applications.

By using Kluster, our team now enjoys streamlined communication, improved collaboration, and enhanced project efficiency. The platform allows us to have real-time discussions, share files, and conduct video calls within a single environment, eliminating the need for constant switching between different tools. This has significantly reduced communication gaps, ensuring that everyone stays informed and on the same page.

like: I like that Kluster allows for a quick way to forecast individual employees on my team a week, month, and quarter out in advance, as well as being able to forecast from an overall team perspective.
dislike: My main issue with Kluster is from a management, or "roll-up" perspective, as Kluster calls it. The forecast that each of my employees submit does not roll-up into my forecast accurately, nor does it mirror which category/stage they have listed each deal in their forecast in. I am having to take time to pull each of their reports individually (or I have been asking them to just send a screenshot upon submitting for ease of reference) and then go in and manually pull each deal into the correct category for each of my employees to make my teams' forecast accurate. Additionally, if I click on "roll-up" mode, it will show none of my staff has submitted a forecast when they have, and if I go and pull their report/forecast separately, it will show submitted. It could just be something in Kluster that is set up wrong, but I know our Revenue Ops team has inquired a few times and been told it's fixed, and we're still having this issue. It just makes it very manually intensive at this time from a team forecasting perspective that I'm responsible for submitting weekly and monthly.
problems solved: Assuming that Kluster can fix the roll-up mode that I referenced on the previous page, Kluster will be very helpful in allowing myself and my team to accurate forecast a week, month and quarter out in advance and know which specific deals are likely to close each week, and what stage the other deals are in.

like: What I like best about Klsuter is that it integrates seamlessly with Salesforce and reflects updates in less than a few minutes. This is helpful because it gives my manager real-time insights about what deals are in play, what stages they're at, and predicted close dates. This eliminates the need to constantly ping my manager with updates since broad changes are reflected in a visual dashboard.
dislike: I wouldn't say I 'dislike' this about Kluster but I do think there is an area of improvement -- being able to add contextual notes to each deal would be beneficial so that managers have detailed insights into why a deal is in a particular stage and what it will take to progress the deal / when it might progress.
problems solved: The main problem that Kluster is solving is real-time insight for management into deal cycles and the ability to more accurately forecast close dates and revenue amounts. This benefits me as a user because it requires less back and forth between myself and my manager in that I can simply reflect changes in Kluster to give him insights to deal cycles.

problems solved:
Managing pipeline and Enhanced Visibility and Transparency: With Kluster,

project stakeholders gain better visibility into project status, timelines, and resource allocation. The software offers visual dashboards and reporting tools that present key project metrics and data in a clear and accessible manner. This transparency facilitates informed decision-making, enables timely adjustments, and helps identify and mitigate potential bottlenecks or risks.

Efficient Resource Management: Kluster helps optimize resource allocation by providing insights into resource availability, utilization, and allocation across projects. This allows project managers to balance workloads effectively, avoid overburdening team members, and prevent resource conflicts. By maximizing resource efficiency, Kluster enables teams to deliver projects on time and within budget.

like:

I believe we could've picked any platform, but without proper enablement, it would've been a waste of money. The Kluster team has gone above and beyond to ensure our success. I highly recommend working with them.

problems solved: I can forecast my business with a high degree of confidence. I can prepare for QBRs easier and back up the story with data that clearly shows a forward-looking action plan on a different level - individual, team, or region.

dislike: There is nothing about Kluster that I dislike.

Forecasting, pipeline health and conversion stats are always hard to get a handle on using just a CRM; it's also time-consuming to find if you can.
Using Kluster gives you easy and quick access to all the data you need, allowing you to make informed, data-driven decisions.

like: The dashboarding was really well thought out from a salesperson's perspective. Navigation is also designed very efficiently and not 'busy' as you would see form other solutions.
dislike: Still trying to wrap my arms around Kluster Vision. I see it's potential but not yet finding it valuable. I think this is mainly du to the fact I have only been in my role for 4 months.
problems solved: Forecasting, summary of active deals, ability to see deals that are in 'trouble'

like: I love that it estimates what pipeline I'll be getting before I get it.
dislike: Overall it works very well! There are some glitches going between monthly pipeline and quarterly pipeline, but that's really it.
problems solved: It gives me insight into what I can expect in my pipeline in the future.

like: Easy to use and easy to see where my gaps are in forecasting and pipeline
dislike: A lot on info that I am sure I could use but not sure how to use properly
problems solved: Enablig to forecast better  on a weekly basis

Reviewer Role: Senior Account Executive & Team Lead - US
like: I had the pleasure to experience the tool both as a rep and as a sales manager, first it gave me all the transparency and data I needed to shift my focus into the relevant and now Kluster helps me manage my team forecast more effectively and have trust on that forecast when passing it to senior management. It helps me with one-to-one's and drives the conversation on the strategies and plans of attack on a much more clear way.
dislike: Right now there is nothing I dislike about it yet.
problems solved: Transparency on the data, unification of the data from CRM to a clear unique source of information and lastly unification of sales rep management

like:
Kluster makes it really easy to spot trends at the macro and micro levels while surfacing actionable insights to improve both outcomes and forecasting. We are only 3 months in but are already leveraging Kluster dashboards in 1:1s, pipeline reviews, and for BOD reporting.

Also, our CSM, Charlotte, goes above and beyond to ensure we're getting the most out of the tool. Kluster's Client Success team does a great job of sharing rev ops best practices, which have helped improve some of the ways we manage the team.
dislike: Purely from an aesthetic standpoint, the UI could use a bit of a refresh. Functionally, it is very easy to navigate, though.
problems solved: Pipeline management and forecasting. Kluster surfaces previously inaccessible data to enable us to make more data-driven decisions and have better insight into what's driving revenue. Additionally, it's "Latest Headlines" tab surfaces early alerts on the most pressing issues so that we can work on solutions before it's too late.

like:
Being able to have reports within Kluster that are not possible in any of our other tooling (eg. Hubspot). The customer success team are probably the best thing so far with Kluster, they are super responsive and always looking for ways for us to achieve our asks from them.

We've also had some custom projects where we want to build reports in Kluster that didn't exist out of the box, and Kluster have been able to build these for us :)
dislike:
Previously we had to ask Kluster to do minor admin things like remove inactive users etc which was a bit inconvenient, but they have recently updated Kluster so we have control of this :)

We've had some cases where specific lenses keep breaking - but these are custom lenses we had created so the logic isn't standard so teething problems are expected
problems solved:
Being able to easily get real time metrics over things like sales velocity etc without any manual calculations or work from our team. We also use Kluster for reviewing sales people's activity and deciding targets and forecasts for accurate estimations.

We also use Kluster reports in company wide comms and are a good way to round up the week with reports like 'pipeline change'

like: Having Kluster to provide valuable insights and data is crucial to my success as an Account Executive. I love the ease of use of the Kluster platform and all of the features and functionality.
dislike: There isn't anything I particularly dislike about Kluster.
problems solved: Kluster is providing the data and insights needed as a sales person to shorten the sales cycle and win deals effectively. I can definitely see an improvement in my sales process with Kluster.

like:
Accurate forecasting - One of the key strengths of Kluster is its ability to generate accurate forecasts. The software utilizes advanced algorithms and data analytics techniques to analyze historical data and generate future predictions. During my testing, I was impressed by the accuracy of the forecasts, which helped us make well-informed decisions and optimize our planning processes.

Customizable - Kluster offers a range of customizable features that cater to diverse forecasting needs. The software allows users to adjust parameters, input different variables, and apply specific models, enabling us to tailor our forecasts to match our unique requirements. This flexibility was particularly valuable in aligning the forecasts with our business objectives.

Great support.
dislike: Learning Curve: The initial learning curve of Kluster might be a bit steep for users who are not familiar with forecasting software. Some additional guidance or tutorials could be beneficial to help new users get up to speed more quickly.
problems solved: As an Account Executive, Kluster has been a game-changer in solving critical problems and significantly benefiting me in my role. One of the key advantages it offers is enhanced forecasting accuracy. Kluster's advanced algorithms and robust data analytics capabilities provide me with highly accurate forecasts. This accuracy allows me to make more informed decisions, set realistic targets, and develop effective strategies to drive revenue growth. With Kluster, I can confidently rely on the forecasts generated, enabling me to better plan and allocate resources, identify potential risks or opportunities, and ultimately optimize sales performance.

like: Kluster is an absolute dynamo when it comes to pipeline management and forecasting! Its innovative AI capabilities coupled with the intuitive drag and drop functionality turn data interaction into a joy. What's more, it instills a culture of discipline and excellence within our sales team, encouraging top-notch data hygiene in Salesforce that significantly enhances our overall business operations.
dislike: While Kluster is already a standout tool for small to medium businesses, it's geared up to excel in the enterprise realm. Our complex quarterly sales cycle calls for a slightly different approach. I am genuinely excited about Kluster's commitment to continuous improvement and their dedication to adapt their platform to address the unique dynamics of large enterprise dealflows.
problems solved: Kluster is a champion, taking on key challenges like revenue forecasting and pipeline visibility with remarkable efficacy. It presents us with a real-time, crystal clear snapshot of our sales pipeline, empowering us to strategically allocate resources with absolute confidence. It's not just about forecasting; Kluster provides predictability, allowing us to plan with optimism and hit our revenue targets with surefire certainty

like: Kluster was one of the few platforms on the market willing to work with the complexities and individuality of our business. No request or question for the customer success team is too small. The team took their time to understand our business, did not rush our implementation, and continued to make suggestions for better use of the platform.
dislike: I wish there were more customization abilities for administrators; all updates to the platform need to go through their team. Some security features required of internal IT teams (SSO, MFA, etc.) are not yet possible.
problems solved: With a business model that varies from tradition SAAS companies, we used Kluster for a more customized forecasting solution.

like: I have a clear view of my current pipe and the associated MRR. Also I know clearly which deals are more likely to be close won.
dislike: Maybe I would say that the UX is not the best that I've seen. A better integration with HubSpot would be appreciated
problems solved:
Clear view of the pipe.
Commitment and best case deals

We are able to anticipate the futur MRR and as a sales commissions I will get.

like: It is a great way to get more insight into your deals and pipeline to better understand where opportunities are in their cycle. it is also helpful to be able to better forecast properly.
dislike: It can be a lot of data. Taking things slowly and using each section bit by bit would be my recommendation because if you are not used to having all of these data points it can be overwhelming to try to understand and use properly at first.
problems solved: Kluster is solving forecasting issues and helping the sales team better forecast deals more appropriately so leadership understands the pipeline and deals that are real and coming into the funnel.

like: I like that I can use Kluster to have a better and more accurate understanding of the forecast of the sales team I am working with. Custom reports/widgets. Easy to understand.
dislike: I think Kluster could be better with dropdown and sub-sections. I feel sometimes some sub-sections or dropdowns could help you to verticalize the organization. Right now it looks a bit flat.
problems solved: I am using Kluster to better understand the sales trends, using this for the 1:1 with each sales leaders but also to communicate insight and trends to Senior Stakeholders. It is easier than building your own reports. Simply looking there and better understanding trends by playing with different variables.

like: Makes forecasting much easier. Great to see how Kluster reviews deal health. It's allowing us to have full transparency on deals as a team.
dislike: It's taken a while to set up but we are now seeing the benefits of that
problems solved: We used to have a hard time tracking deal health and seeing what is progressing forward. We are now seeing more stale deals leaving pipeline and an active focus on healthy deals.

like: From a revops perspective, Kluster is a very nice tool to help me and my team forecast. This gives us a clear indicator of where we can expect to land in terms of new revenue until the end of the quarter. It also helps reps understand where they are in terms of pipeline and enables data-driven decision-making.
dislike: the UI can sometimes feel a bit chunky, but generally really like Kluster
problems solved: Kluster helps me understand my pipeline and helps me forecast the amount of expected sales for the quarter. So while mid-quarter I'd only have an idea of what I expect to close, kluster helps me create reliable data-backed forecasts

like: Easy to visualize in real-time, drill down into the detail around a key business metric, see historical data and trending information. Easy to run a sales and marketing meeting from thanks to the ease of navigating through key business metrics.
dislike: None really. Maybe some more marketing centric measures and a link from Kluster to Hubspot dashboards and back but not so much a dislike as something that would be useful. Kluster could well do that but our instance may not have been configured that way.
problems solved:
Real time sales analytics
Pipeline health
Revenue operations
Average deal size, win rate and pipeline insights
Forecast calls
Sales performance reviews
Exec readouts

like: Kluster provides all of the data and insights you need to forecast effectively and gives you a view of how your sales team is performing over time. Their support is also first class and always on hand to help you get access to the data you need.
dislike: Their integration with HubSpot could be improved.
problems solved: Helping us forecast accurately and provide insight into how we're performing as a sales team.

like: I really like the hubspot integration as I do not need to do double work in different tools. Also it gives me and my manager clarity on my pipeline and the health of each deal.
dislike: Before, an error was showing when trying to submit my forecast but it is no longer showing.
problems solved:
- Just using one tool for forecasting with direct integration with Hubspot.
- Gives us very usefull insights for each deal showing a healthscore and giving advice on them.

like: The ability to slice and dice the data, along with the ability to see immediate historical trends enables our team to see the insights we need, when we need them.
dislike: Nothing stands out that that I dislike, but I wish it was integrated more into the tools we already use to give visibility to more individual contributors of how they are doing compared to our benchmark.
problems solved: Kluster is surfacing data on our sales performance that we previously have not been able to visualize or see in a way that is actionable. The instant trends and the ability to drill down into specific people is extremely helpful.

like: It eliminates the need for other documents and allows my manager to quickly see what I've forecasted and why.
dislike: Sometimes I wonder if this could be done in our CRM instead and eliminating another tool, but the CRM likely isn't as user friendly.
problems solved: Kluster is making it easier to understand my pipeline and communicate that information with my manager and leadership is a fairly easy and streamlined way.

like:
Super useful in giving me visibility on what could close in my pipeline reviews.

Gives me a great indication of what I'm expected to close, prompting me to manage my pipeline better.

The support so far has been amazing and super helpful/ timely whenever I have any questions.
dislike: I do not have anything to report at this stage!
problems solved: Visibility on pipeline and probability of hitting my target.

like: Overall positive things to say about Kluster.  We've run into several issues as our business is small but complicated, and they've leaned in and helped us correct them.  The team has been responsive and provided numerous training opportunities.
dislike: It's a solid product overall, but it does take a fair amount of customization.  We've had to go back to them numerous time to have currency issues fixed, etc...
problems solved: Helps see holistic forecast and map out key KPI's such as days to close, pipeline loss, stallpoints, etc...  The visualization and waterfall charts are really cool

like: Kluster lifts the hood to reveal the true nature of each reps pipeline, rather than the face value metrics. This means forecasting is more reliable, and coaching conversations are more productive.
dislike: The revenue analytics and insights are great, it would be great to be able to drill into the activity around each opportunity to avoid having to jump between systems to know whats going on with a deal.
problems solved: Kluster gives us the ability to see further ahead with our revenue function. Building a picture of what the months ahead look like it means forecasting is more accurate and decision making is more proactive.

like: Kluster's visibility is fantastic, but the very best part of Kluster is the customer support team. They've been extremely helpful, responsive and pleasant.  The platform is highly customizable and quite user-friendly.
dislike: I have only been using the platform for a few weeks and haven't experienced any shortcomings yet. It does take some investment of time to utilize the platform fully. I'm sure there are features that I haven't had an opportunity to explore yet.
problems solved: Kluster is driving pipeline visibility and allowing us to increase forecasting accuracy. It has also allowed us to identify areas where deals stall, which we previously hadn't had.

like: Cluster is easily the most intuitive tool I've worked with to manage my team's business. The visualizations and workflows are top-notch. You don't need a Phd in data science to use Kluster like "other" CRM/reporting tools out there.
dislike: I haven't seen any yet. Maybe I've missed this somewhere, but would be nice to see some loss/competition reports so that we can better understand where/how we can be doing better.
problems solved: We have much quicker insight into the overall health of our business, and it speeds up internal reporting...removing much of the manual processes we use to rely on with spreadsheets.

like: Hello, Account Manager here, we use Kluster for New Business / Farming forecasting, and it makes it incredibly easy to do so. I like the notes feature for opportunities and insights from past & existing deals, which allow you to get a good overview and plan action ahead based on trends of what worked.
dislike: I don't find anything that I dislike about Kluster.
problems solved: Issues with which deals are staggering in the pipe, and then what action plan I can make based on past trends. Noting everything is salesy detail that is great for discussing stuff 1-to-1 with your manager.

like: Kluster allows us to match our revenue goals with current pipeline stages and understand what's keeping us from increasing our pnl. All of this under one roof.
dislike: Need to keep HubSpot up to date in order to have up-to-date data.
problems solved: In a tough quarter, Kluster allows us to analyze what we need to work on to increase revenue for next quarter.

like: I think that the most powerful aspect of Kluster is that it allows you to gain a full understanding of your pipeline and forecasting, whilst offering an objective and unbiased look at the statistics and reality of it.
dislike: I do have a bit of concern as to how effective the AI would be. Until now we have not had enough data put through the system, and we have quite a unique use case. Perhaps this makes it less effective.
problems solved: We were struggling to get a realistic idea of our pipeline and forecasting had been somewhat inconsistent and inaccurate.

like: I really like Kluster's dashboard to break out different sales pipeline so I have visibility on the sales motions
dislike: Sometime the information is not cleanly displayed but this is not a huge issue for me
problems solved: Kluster helps me to have a clear view of the bookings information so I can run cohort analytics and churn analysis on them

like: The ability to forecast my pipeline accurately and gain insight into what I need to go after quota for a particular month or quarter! More intuitive than using the CRM to accomplish the same goals.
dislike: I have not found anything to dislike at this point, but I'll be sure to update my review should I run into any issues.
problems solved: I need to accurately forecast my pipeline so my team can effectively go after our quotas. The added ability to analyze each won/lost deal is super valuable for helping to add more value to my clients.

like: Kluster provides insights quickly that would typically be very difficult to calculate. It allows us to forecast in real time and make decisions quickly. Not just as a team but also as individuals.
dislike: The initial set-up period was quite clunky. It took a while and lots of attempts to get everything syncing correctly. But once this initial part was done it has been great.
problems solved: Giving us better insights into our pipeline health and overall performance as a business. We can track performance against targets and see where we need to improve as a team.

like: I am a novice user, so having a Kluster partner available to guide us and help us leverage the tool has been instrumental.
dislike: No downsides. If anything, I need to take the time to learn more and make better use of the features.
problems solved: Getting the reports I need quickly and easy to use in executive meetings.

like: If you've ever had to fill out a spreadsheet for forecasting, you will know how painful that process is. Kluster simplifies forecasting and allows it to be completed in seconds.
dislike: Nothing, so far everything's impressed me. If it saves me time, allows me to drag and drop oppurtunities into commits and provides insight into deal stages, I'm happy.
problems solved: Kluster makes the business critical task of forecasting very very simple, allowing you to complete it under a minute, and provides clever insight into your sales analytics as well as the teams.

like: Kluster arms me with the data I need to understand what I need to focus my efforts on to improve. Since using Kluster I've been laser-focused on where my gaps are, without relying on guesswork. I can understand my pipeline and forecast accurately.
dislike: There's nothing I don't like about Kluster!
problems solved: Making sense of my current opportunities by using data from past deals, which allows me to forecast. Understanding areas and holes in my pipeline stages, so I know which areas of the sales cycle to focus levelling up on.

like: Kluster creates dashboards and views that a far easier to navigate than Salesforce. Beyond that, the analytics are beneficial in terms of staging opportunities and remaining organized with my pipeline overall.
dislike: I can't really say that I have any dislikes, but I could certainly utilize the tool more frequently as I am sure I am not utilizing it to its fullest potential.
problems solved: Forecasting to management is the main problem Kluster is solving. It's giving us a place to provide updates and it's commonly used during internal planning calls.

like: Dashboard view and analytics to ensure healthy pipeline.
dislike: Personally do not have anything negative to say.
problems solved: Understanding my pipeline and accurately forecasting to EL.

like:
It takes away the leg work of prepping for a pipeline review and allows us to focus on the important topics.

Accurate forecasting on where an AE will finish for the month/ quarter/ year which also enables us to identify where the top of the funnel needs to be for them to hit their required target.

Integration was seamless.

Outside of the product, the team is excellent. Great people who offer a lot.
dislike: It takes some time to get used to the platform and requires a few training sessions to get used to it.
problems solved: Kluster takes the guesswork out of our new business funnel. We can hold departments and individuals accountable with it, while providing accurate forecasting to other departments in the business.

like: We can easily see key revenue insights on one pane of glass in an easily digestible format. Charts and dashboards are super helpful
dislike: Some of the navigation from different periods can be frustrating, but not a major point
problems solved: Sales forecasting and single source of truth data

like: Very easy to update forecasts. I also like the pipeline and deal health view.
dislike: We are pretty early in our adoption of Kluster, but I haven't encountered any issues. It looks like we have some duplicate dashboards in our instance, which confused me initially, but that may be just how we set it up.
problems solved: Kluster streamlines our pipeline reviews. It's also a good tool for getting insight into the health of your pipeline. Helps surface certain red flags to keep an eye out for.

like: Easy, drag-and-drop functionality. Clean UI. Takes under a minute to submit a forecast.
dislike: Sometimes the integration between Kluster and our CRM is not always refreshed. This is my main critique.
problems solved: Allows me a clean view of current quarter's deals and easily submit them in a forecast.

like: I like that it gives me the ability to see past data and accurately predict what my professional commit will be
dislike: It gives you insights on past closed/won, closed/lost, and pipeline deals that allow you to forecast. Predicting trends based on historical data is very helpful
problems solved: Overall team view. I like seeing my own analytics but when my manager is looking at everyone's call in a zoom meeting she can't click into each rep and see why we called what we called

like: Being able to segment views by week/month/quarter/etc makes it easier to keep track of pipeline, plan where to focus, and give a user-friendly view of where my opportunities are. Also allows the team to forecast to senior management much more accurately and boosts accountability.
dislike: There's sometimes a delay in reflecting Salesforce data into Kluster, though, to be honest, I'm unsure if this is a Salesforce issue or a Kluster one. Aside from this, no complaints so far!
problems solved:
- Pipeline/opportunity forecasting; tracking key measurables and revenue trends
- Increases accountability (no one like submitting an empty forecast!)
- Gives senior management, and the sales teams in general, a more streamlined and user-friendly way to plan, analyse, and execute sales-funnel plans

like: Kluster brings additional valuable insights to Salesforce data, enabling sales managers, the management team, RevOps team, etc to access the key metrics and leading indicators. The forecasting feature, as well as Kluster Vision are absolutely great tools.
dislike: It would be great if I could create my own reports and dashboards, update filters as needed instead of having to rely always on the support team.
problems solved: Kluster is helping us identify gaps and trends, easily, so that corrective actions can be taken timely.

like: The insights for each opportunity gives me the clarity to cut through storytime and ensure that the salesperson is not victim of their own wishful thinking.
dislike: The process of writing back information for rich text created some formatting issues.
problems solved: Insights into each deal.

like: I like that my manager no longer messages me about the state of each deal. The context I'm able to provide in Kluster around each deal is easy to mark with emojis and notes.
dislike: It is slow to reflect changes in the close date between SFDC and Kluster. I think this might be a specific problem with our set up.
problems solved: My manager no longer sends me fire drills asking about deals. The context is all in the forecast report.

like: It helps with forecasting and realizing at what stages my deals get stuck in the most often. This helps me to take a  better approach and put my focus on progressing deals.
dislike: So far i like everything Kluster shows me. I wish they would tell you a little bit more about what the data means and how it's calculated.
problems solved: It's given our organization much more accurate forecasting and tells us how we can get better based on the data

like: Very intuitive and customisable dashboard which makes it super easy to digest and use data
dislike: Sometimes it can take a while to configure it in a way that suits you best but that's only because I have never been shown how to use it properly and there's a lot available
problems solved: Salesforce data can be a bit inaccessible and difficult to extract and analyse at times whereas kluster clearly and cleanly displays it ready to use in presentations etc

like: You get great reports and data out of Kluster to give that enable actionable results for the entire team. Management receives the insights they need and the sales team gets answers to complicated sales ops questions and the data to support reps through the process.
dislike: With all of these tools, it takes a bit of time to get used to the UI and setting up the dashboards takes a bit of trial and error. No major roadblocks, it's a great tool.
problems solved: This is solving our lack of communication between management and individual sales reps enabling us to view actionable data that helps us do our job and saves us time when we have internal meetings.

like:
- news feed - highlighted anomalies and potential risk without need of scrolling through all the KPIs
- ability to submit forecasts for Team & Reps
- kluster insights
- ability to compare to same time in previous periods
- custom reports
- responsive Customer Success
dislike:
- one size doesn't fit it all and need a lot of customisation which not always goes smoothly
- no data quality control when rolling out fix or new custom update
- bugs and same metrics with different values in different places. However Customer Success always tries to rectify these
- report desciptions sometimes are misleading
problems solved:
- pipeline performance/forecasting
- tracks KPIs and trends
- flaging potential risks

like: Kluster has been super helpful for our team. It's a lot easier to keep track of our forecasts and make sure we stay on track quarter to quarter. The dashboard is intuitive and very easy to use. It also integrates easily with our CRM HubSpot.
dislike: There is not much to dislike about Kluster. Their team has been super attentive with getting our team up to speed with the product and have given us several training sessions.
problems solved: We did not have an efficient way for sales people to forecast but also stick to their forecasts and make sure they are accurate. It's been a great tool for sales people at our company to take control.

like: it shows the visibility of every stage in our funnel, makes what would take me an hour in CRM possible in minutes. Can more easily then adjust my strategy as needed.
dislike: The only issue so far was with my log in initially, but fixed rapidly.
problems solved: Sometimes we lacked visibility and definitive answers on where to focus and why, but the clear visibility for everyone means we can see be much more accurate in our strategy.

like: Kluster is a brilliant tool that allows me as a team lead to drive better pipeline management, accurate forecasting and cleaning up stalled deals. There's a lot of other functionalities but those are the main challenges which Kluster helps mitigate.
dislike: Sometimes I wish that the snapshots could be edited a bit more, however the CSM and Data-department is extremely helpful so it is very rare that I'm not offered a solution that is satisfactory.
problems solved: Kluster is a valuable tool that assists us in our day-to-day operations and our overall analysis of the sales force's performance and areas of improvement. The accesibility also gives the sales rep's a great overview of their own progress.

like: Kluster is a data wizard. It dishes out the analytics and reports you need to make informed decisions; helping my rose coloured glasses to reflect the true colours of the opportunity.
dislike: Rolling out to the partial team led to a disconnect between those who had vs. those who didn't. That phased approach wasted a bit of time our side.
problems solved: Pipeline visualisation; anlysising team performance against best practice; accurate reporting for the board

like: Fantastic tool for leveraging insights and performance metrics to forecast accurately. Love the ability to track sales velocity, highlights and pipeline health.
dislike: It can be a little daunting at first to learn, but the onboarding process has been super detailed and the team very helpful
problems solved: Forecasting has traditionally been closer to educated guesses from conversations with clients in the pipeline, but now we have accurate and detailed historical data to leverage

like: We used to submit our forecasts through Gong which was time consuming and manual. Kluster means we can sync with Salesforce and click submit and its done!
dislike:
Nothing so far - hugely beneficial.

We had great training from the team and they are on hand if we need help.
problems solved: saves time submitting sales forecast for the month and the quarter, everything is completely automated with Salesforce and my managers love it.

like: Being able to see the top-level info on my pipeline such as Deal Insights, Days in Stage & Alerts
dislike: Can be a bit buggy at times but generally works fine.
problems solved: A view of my pipeline, dashboard and KPIs

like:
It's super easy to learn and use

The reports are iunsightful and help you to manage your pipeline effectively, using live data

Gives you actionable insights that help you to succeed
dislike: You need to keep logging in quite often - I'm sure it's for security but if you leave the page it makes you sign in again
problems solved: Helping me to understand which deals need my time and attention the most

like: User experience and data. It is easy to use, to understand and it brings valuable data.
dislike: Not sure if it is Kluster or Hubspot that sometimes not all the filters can be used. But it is not a big deal.
problems solved: Getting an overview of where I am, what do I have to do to get my target, how many meetings I need, what my sales cycle and sales velocity are

like: Very comprehensive set of analysis features and fairly intuitive user experience.I also like some of of the forecating features which are predictive in nature based on historical performance.
dislike: It can take some time to set up new modules, dashboards, and reports but once they are set up the platform works very effectively.

like: That you have all your data right in front of you. From open pipeline to stalled pipeline - it's easy to navigate.

like: Like the fact that you're very easily able to see where you are, in comparison to your team - the UX also is really good, its very easy to see & navigate through the platform
dislike: I haven't been using it very long yet, however ther hasn't been anything I dislike during my usage so far.
problems solved: Having a clear view on pipeline and actions, steps or progress of deals.

like: I like that you are able to see a quick snapshot view of your pipeline and what you have pending to close.

like: Customizable insights that actually tell a story and draw  correlation between enablement and performance. From the top of the funnel to individual rep performance, you can drill into data points and not be killed by analysis paralysis.
dislike: Nothing really. Team listened to our enhancement requests and rolled out missing functionality.
problems solved:
Marketing and Sales alignment
Funnel management
Rep performance management
Pipeline management

like: So many ways to understand and manage your pipeline, forecasts, deal flow and give accurate bookings projections. Never-ending insight reports driving data-driven decisions. Understand what's really working  and live without the need for massive spreadsheets manually updated. People are great as well, top-class team
dislike: Small company and so we know they're working with limited capacity, means we know they're working on the things that matter. Date pickers in some of the reports are a little clunky and would benefit from a refresh
problems solved: Accurate forecasting, pipeline flow, pipeline tracking, post-quarter analytics, board call prep and GTM strategy planning

like: Having visibility over my pipeline and where I am tracking against my target. When I have one-to-ones with my manager, I am able to provide accurate insight on my current performance.
dislike: There aren't downsided to Kluster however as an SDR I will make more use of Kluster in the future.
problems solved: Getting visibility of my pipeline where i didnt before.

like: Very clear and easy to use page for providing overview on deals and pipeline
dislike: To be honest I don't think there are many down sides, except for when submitting a forecast it would be nice if you could revert it back
problems solved: I use Kluster to forecast close dates and amount for deals, helping to organise my accounts and time

like: Kluster is clear and easy to use. It gives me facts and figures based on history and allows me to work smarter with regards to my pipeline.
dislike: Struggling to find anything I do not like currently about Kluster.
problems solved: Kluster alows me to see my own pipeline and the pipeline of the team. It allows me to forecast better.

like: We use custom objects in Salesforce, and Kluster was one of the only platforms on the market that I was confident would work for our use case. The Kluster team is excellent to work with and truly understands our business.
dislike: Because we are using a more bespoke build of the platform, changes take some time.
problems solved: We leverage Kluster for forecasting

like: The ability to forecast ARR for our COO and CFO was highly accurate and easy to use. We've tried many tools before, but this seems to have all the bells and whistles we need, yet keeping things simple and engaging.
dislike: Initially learning was a little tricky for me with too much data or can be overwhelming, but once I went through the online course... Honestly, I got the gist of it, and it was like any other program.
problems solved: Forcast quarterly targets for our VP and have the accurate date to have a weekly intelligent conversation.

like: Kluster provides amazing insights. I use it to monitor pipeline and our business. I like the tool better than salesforce.
dislike: I work in partnerships so seeing sell to and sell through is tricky. For channels, there are many motions and to capture both, this list would need to be constantly updated.
problems solved: Having more visibility to our business.

like: You can have all top line figures you need to manage your business. You can look at pipeline retrospectively which is impossible in a CRM.
dislike: You can't change the axis on the dashboards or vizzes as flexibly as I'd like. The UI is na little clunky.
problems solved: Board reporting saving time. Salaes analytics helping coach my team.

like: its real-time updates, intuitive interface, comprehensive analytics, and collaborative workflow management, which contribute to improved revenue generation and target achievement.
dislike: Nothing really. Sometimes it takes a few seconds to sync with HS. But it is not a problem
problems solved: Kluster solves revenue management challenges, boosting sales efficiency and collaboration, leading to increased revenue and better business outcomes.

like: Understanding where in the sales funnel I need to change in order to improve results
dislike: We can't make the most out of Kluster due to incomplete Salesforce data
problems solved: How to speed up my sales cycle, how likely I am to win deals, who to cold call, how to improve specific areas of my sales cycle, etc.

like: The dynamic overview of your KPIs and pipeline progress makes a difference in the day-to-day activities and dramatically supports the quality of forecasts to management.
dislike: There are no particular 'negatives' about the tool so far.
problems solved: The tool softens the difficulties of handling high volumes of deals, keeping track of progress, and giving accurate forecasts to management.

like: Allows me to visualise my pipeline and communicate it effectively to revenue managers. Easy enough to use and I can easily see which parts of my pipeline need the most attention.
dislike: Sometimes can be slow to pull updated contract values from salesfor e.
problems solved: Allows me to clearly visualise pipeline and priotise in order of priority.

like: Pipeline and forecasting information including age of deals, days in stage, and what good looks like when I win and when I lose
dislike: It's not always easy to know where to find reports. Perhaps it's just a matter of more training
problems solved: It's helping me to optimize my sales process and clean up my pipeline

like: Kluster has worked very well for our sales team, where we previously haven't had much luck with other forecasting tools. It's straightforward, user-friendly and took very little time to get ramped on how to use the tool.
dislike: Have been using Kluster for about 6 weeks, and no complaints so far!
problems solved: Kluster is solving our forecasting ability on a weekly, monthly and quarterly scale. Previously we were relying on spreadsheets, which took a lot of manual work with no automation. Kluster takes the human error our of the equation.

like:
Great, responsive team with a genuine interest in delivering value to customers.
An internal team with strong experience in SaaS sales which means you get a wealth of reporting out of the box which tick many of the boxes for sales performance analytics which you can't get out of Salesforce and would take hours to build in PowerBI.
Specifically deals with Salesforce reporting limitations around (a) Performance vs target (b) Intel on what might happen in the future based on historical trends.
Puts actionable insights in the hands of reps on both near-term forecast (what can I do to increase likelihood of hitting target this month?) as well as long term pipeline (what do I need to do now in order to ensure I hit target next quarter?).
Builds rep and leader accountability via intricate forecasting module.
dislike: Understand that there are some great roadmap items which will put configuration and administration more so in the hands of the customer.  In the meantime, Kluster offer very responsive customer success / implementation resource, so this doesn't represent too much of an inconvenience.
problems solved: See above.

like: I love the visual representation of how prospects move through the funnel.  Kluster gives us more insight than we ever had before.  From a Marketing standpoint, it allows us to have more informed conversations with our Sales team.
dislike: No real dislikes.  Some initial learning curves in optimizing our platform use, but that is mostly due to its robust capabilities.
problems solved: Broader visibility into our sales funnel.  It makes it easier to project if we are tracking toward hitting or missing our targets and helps us pinpoint general trends.

like: Visibility into deals and what stage they are in.
dislike: When trying to select weather you would like to edit for the quarter or month that drop down needs some work.
problems solved: It keeps my deals organized. But my favortire part is having those numbers live somehwere other then SFDC

like: Easy to use and forecast. Integration with salesforce makes updates simple.
dislike: Slight learning curve at the beginning, but nothing too bad
problems solved:
Weekly forecasting is made easy with Kluster
Deal updates is simplfied with Salesforce integration, using less time in administration tasks to focus on more important tasks.

like: Easy to use. I like the main dashboard that shows all the info I need on one screen.
dislike: Maybe I just haven't used it enough, but I would like to be able to see my team's metrics compared to mine.
problems solved: It's helping me understand my sales metrics.

like: We use Kluster multiple times a week while forecasting our months/quarters. Kluster makes it easy to see how we are tracking and how small improvements to certain metrics will lead to a significant impact on key results.
dislike: Not much to dislike on it. Took time to understand a couple metrics but with an onboarding training that was ironed out easily.
problems solved: We use it to forecast our pipelines and it has made it easy to share across levels what our expectations are for month/quarter.

like: Kluster is a great tool. The Kluster team have worked hard to tailor the solution to our needs and it's invaluable when looking at team performance, forecasting and analysing trends.
dislike: As with all tools, there are reports that need tweaking and iterating on but this is expected. The main thing is that the Kluster team are very hands-on in supporting these fixes quickly.
problems solved: Evaluating team performance, forecasting and analysing trends. We used ti use SFDC for the reports we are using in Kluster, but the granularity and alternative ways of looking at the same data is invaluable.

like: Kluster makes it that I have complete visibility into my pipeline. An an IC it saved me hours a week on forecasting and allows me to spot risk in my pipeline early
dislike: Nothing to dislike at the moment - it's clear and easy to use
problems solved: It's allowing me to more accurately track and report on pipeline. It's allowed me to better report to the business and avoid awkward conversations I've had in the past when the numbers have been completely off!

like: It gives you an easy overview of painpoints and keeps track of old deals to drive
dislike: Could not really see downsides, as it does what you expect
problems solved: Keeping track of old deals and keep focus on the right things

like: Kluster allows me to forecast my goals. This helps me stay on track. It allows me to organize my targets and current deals
dislike: Something I would like is customization of dashboard
problems solved: It is solving the quota goals

like: Easy access to info you need! Pull up Kluster in management meetings.
dislike: Could do with more reports as well as comparing with old deals
problems solved: Usually have ti use multiple spreadsheets to track closed lost and deal progress

like: The Kluster insights are really helpful
dislike:
to save time in understanding how the pipeline changes.
Kluster overall has a great ease of use and being able to have a bespoke dashboard.
problems solved:
Saving a lot of time and giving clarity. I can see easier where changes have been made and visually show reps when an Opportunity should be removed from the pipeline based on insights.
Also looking into conversions throughout the sales cycle

like: It's very easy to dip in and adjust your forecasts to get an idea of what input would be required for different scenarios. This means I don't have to spend nearly as much time in spreadsheets or even worse Salesforce reports.
dislike: Nothing that jumps out immediately. As with all Saas tools there is room for improvement but there isn't one glaring area I get frustrated with.
problems solved: Great visibility into our pipeline and forecasting.

like: Allows me to accuratley forcast. User friendly and good visually. Good Predictions.
dislike: Can sometimes be a little difficult to use with integrations.
problems solved: Allows me to accurtatley forcast to my manager in a timely fashion.

like: look of dashboards, everything is intuitive
dislike: Hard to drill down into deal specifics sometimes
problems solved: How to decrease our mid funnel timeframe from it's current number of days in stage, to half that

like: makes submitting my forecasting really easy but also simple.
dislike: so far there isnt anything i dont like about kluster.
problems solved: main problem is giving me visability over what my best case/commits are

like:
Kluster gives me a radar in an otherwise very hrs to navigate job.

Allowing me to accurately forecast and find gaps that need filling to enable me to reach my targets.
dislike: There honestly isn't a thing I dislike about kluster. Without it I couldn't do my job.
problems solved: It allows me to see where the gaps are in my pipeline and enables me to accurately forecast to sales leaders.

like: The ability to track forecasts from different regions in one area.
dislike: At this point, there is nothing I dislike.
problems solved: Data is housed in one location with different break-out points.

like: Helps manage pipeline and predict revenue easily for both reps and management.
dislike: I wouldn't change anything - there will be future evolutions that improve the breadth of functionalities, but the software as it is right now works as it needs to.
problems solved: Revenue prediction, mostly. Helps with identifying gaps in pipeline and adjusting sales strategy to fix these. The end result is more accurate revenue prediction.

like: Kluster allows us to draw actionable insights from our data to support forecasting on an individual rep basis but also across our sales team.
dislike: Haven't come across anything so far that I've disliked.
problems solved: It's helping us draw insights from the data that we have in our CRM whilst helping us more accurately future plan what we need to do to achieve our targets.

like: The epic CS team and the community analytics section
dislike: Bias towards salesforce but that's most providers
problems solved: Helping us dig deeper into our pipeline

like: I love how Kluster synthesizes our company's data into succinct, yet informative bits of insights that wouldn't usually be obvious to me on the surface.
dislike: Being very new to Kluster, to this point I haven't encountered anything that I've disliked about the platform.
problems solved: Kluster is providing a centralized, organized space to manage our company's forecasting models

like: Very fast SaaS RevOps function that is best complemented with regular sessions with their excellent customer success
dislike: They are scaling too and sometimes lose track of the working improvements back to our team
problems solved: Fast data insights from our GTM function to complement our then nascent RevOps team- added more bandwidth and benchmarking was also useful

like: Kluster takes the headache out of Friday's forecast and allows me to share more forecasts with confidence and accuracy. It also updates in superfast time from Salesforce so waiting around for updates.
dislike: So far everything has worked well and there's nothing i could think about changing.
problems solved: more accurate and up to date forecasting.

like: I like the the tool pulls from SFDC and provides charts and logs
dislike: it's not easy to use.  I used Clari in the past and it was much more simple .  Easier to navigate and create reports. More drop downs and categories.
problems solved: Quick views of the reps numbers

like: I like the updated news stream, that uses all our Salesforce Stats to give a very quick overview of how our quarter is looking.
dislike: That we currently cannot add new users ourselves.
problems solved: Being able to determine how realistic our goals for the quarter are.

like: it gives really in depth insight into each rep and overall team. can help see trends and create tangible action plans from the stats
dislike: can be almost too much info so need to understand how to weed through it
problems solved: being able to make sense of sfdc data, sales reps trends, and more. really helps me coach sales reps

like: I like the userbility of the too as it seemed to be very intuitive.
dislike: There was nothing that stood out to me that wasnt positive.
problems solved: It is helping me with my sales forecast and saves me so much time on a weekly basis

like: The reports and data you get out of Kluster give legitimately actionable results for everyone-- insights for management, answers to complicated sales ops questions, and (most importantly) data to support rep process/strategy changes.  The team at Kluster has been excellent throughout.
dislike: Not really a dislike, more just something to keep in mind-- if you're talking to an audience that isn't used to multi-faceted charts and data, it requires some explanation.  Nothing insurmountable by any means, just keep in mind that there will need to be time to digest.
problems solved: When and why are deals being lost, how do differences in sales motion affect a team, how do different reps behaviors affect their performance in different areas.  A big benefit is being able to track SFDC data historically.

like: Basically, for me, the timeline feature on the prospects is giving me a really cool inside without that much effort
dislike: To be honest I would like to create my own reports on my own dashboard without always asking someone to do it.
problems solved: Have a basic overview of sales activity daily and also sales forecasting.

like: Love the analytics provided. The platform is super easy and insightful to use.
dislike: I cannot think of anything. It is everything a sales professional can ask for.
problems solved: Forecasting-how to bridge the gap of where we currently stand.

like: You have a clear overview of your pipeline management, deals, sales velocity and planning.
dislike: Since it is connected to your CRM you have to have a cler structure when uploading your data.
problems solved: Deals management and planning

like: UI is seamless, reports are a huge value add, lift on my end was minimal, support continues to be top notch
dislike: haven't been able to find anything so far.
problems solved: Real time visiblity into our GTM metrics

like: the interface and gamification of forecasting
dislike: not embedded in CRM so requires separate login to maintain data
