Reviewer Role: Vice President of Strategic Product Sales
like: Ability to adjust forecast across account team
dislike: Overall the product is working good and no feedback on what I don't like.
problems solved: Kluster is helping the team improve their forecast accuracy.

like:
-Super visually pleasing
-Quick visibility on my full pipeline
-Easy to make changes
dislike: -Nothing, i prefer it to my CRM for reporting
problems solved: Visibility over my quarter on quarter pipeline health

like: The simplicity of this tool makes it very powerful.
dislike: The User Interface could be a bit prettier
problems solved: Sales pipeline

like: Kluster has been a game changer in the way we forecast and measure/track KPIs. The tool is very customizable, easy to use, and provides us with actionable data we trust. Our CSM team works tirelessly to ensure that Kluster continues to meet our organization's needs as we evolve.
dislike: After ~3 months of using Kluster, there is very little I dislike. As expected, we have run into the occasional bug but the Kluster team is always quick to assist despite time zone differences.
problems solved: Kluster has replaced a lot of manual reporting/dashboarding previously done in SalesForce. This automation and access to current data improve our workflow and ability to make informed decisions quickly.

like: I love that Kluster makes data fun and easily digestible, both for myself as a manager, and for my team, who are typically turned off by data and spreadsheets. Kluster makes it easy for my team to know where they need to focus on in order to make their quota for the month, quota, and year.
dislike: Not much, but I would love to be able to compare my team's data to other regions in the company, as well as having a view of my team vs the entire company as a whole.
problems solved: Kluster helps me solve the problem of my team not owning their data, as the reports are easy to read and update in real time. By using Kluster, my 1:1s have become more efficient as the data takes away the storytime and excuses from the reps.

like: The predictive forecasting with the built-in AI functionality removes the subjective component of 1:1s with sales reps and also makes forecasting more accurate by looking at the trends and facts. Kluster Vision for the sales reps shows how little actions have a giant impact which is huge for sales reps; especially those that are struggling.
dislike: Kluster needs to be more self-service. While the Kluster team is amazing, I want to be able to do more on my own without bothering them.
problems solved: We adopted Kluster for the forecasting component but the added value of having better, more data-driven 1:1s and being able to see live conversion analytics to pinpoints gaps in our process has been a critical need that Kluster solves. It's also helping us see where marketing leads stall, and what types of marketing leads soar through the process more quickly.

like:
Kluster provides so many insights and is highly customizable. We love that we can create multiple views so that we can get different snapshots of the business. It's highly customizable so we can focus on what's important to the business at any time.

They have an AMAZING CS team that goes  above and beyond to make sure that everything is set up and customized to your business. They also share great insghts and bes practices that they see from other customers.
dislike: The only negative I would say is that there is no admin panel to go in and configure your own settings; this all has to be completed through your CSM. However, their communication is excellent, and the turnaround is very quick. If there are ever discrepancies in the data, they are fast to resolve it.
problems solved:
- Insights into sales team trends such as lead velocity and pipeline coverage.
- Forecasting
- Team coaching

like: Through Kluster we get powerful insights that would have been very time-consuming or impossible to pull from Salesforce or PowerBi. We also get support from a team who speak our language, understand our challenges, and creatively find solutions to help us scale fast. The CS team at Kluster simultaneously run multiple projects with us, and lead from the front. I wish we had this level of support from the rest of our tech stack!
dislike: What I like about Kluster is when we find gaps in visibility, they listen, and try to fill them. So when we pointed out that Kluster could be better at helping us manage SDRs, and forecast for when new hires would start hitting our pipeline, they were more than happy to build new functionality to cater for our needs which we are now rolling out.
problems solved:
Our success plan so far has focused on a few key areas;
- AE and Manager 1-2-1s assessing pipeline health
- Forecasting
- SDR management
- Recruitment planning
- Inbound Vs Outbound coverage tracking

We have seen a positive impact on pipeline health, and quota attainment.

like: Great functionality, especially in terms of predicting outcomes, based on individual and team. I love the way it provides you with trending good/bad data points
dislike: There are some bugs and glitches in the UI, which can sometimes lead to a poor user experience. As soon as some of these are ironed out, this product will be top class
problems solved:
- Predictability of Pipeline
- If an opportunity isn't real

like: Kluster is a very easy tool to use and will ensure you can manage your KPIs as well as forecast accurately using the insights the platform is able to show. I have used Kluster now at 2 different companies and the developments that they have made are very good, the granularity in which you can report on helps to manage the pipeline throughout the month and prevent any issues before they arise.
dislike: Although the platform has very good insights at every stage and element of a deal it can take a little while to get used to how everything works but the team are very supportive in helping to navigate the platform.
problems solved: I am able to forecast more effectively using the insights Kluster provides, further to this the software enables my manager and I to have more detailed conversations around deals, how they are working and any additional coaching points we need to work on.

like: I can't live without the velocity page..
dislike: That I can't set it up myself and need to call each time.
problems solved: Kluster saves me hour of time with a calculator trying to get data from Hubspot.  It does all the math for me with an easy to understand dashboard.

like: Kluster gives us a sales management team a great way of getting details sales analysis to ensure that we are not only looking at our reps on a topline basis but finding key areas where we can focus training and improvement strategies.
dislike: Sometimes there are elements of the platform that are not pulling through the right data, however Rory and Tom alongside their team are always on hand to fix and resolved this issues almost instantly.
problems solved: We have found that using Kluster's data we are able to understand more about each reps sales cycle, where they are operating in good practice and the areas we need to focus on to improve them. This then structures how we develop individual training plans and get more from each member of the team

like: In depth analytical dashboards provides a wide range of visibility into opportunity progression. Great for basic out of the box visualizations.
dislike: Lack of customization from a user standpoint. All customizations have to be done by Kluster, also limited into what is able to be customized.
problems solved: Kluster provides an easy platform for our sales reps to forecast their opportunities. This then rolls up into sales management to easily view forecasts and analytics.

like: Kluster is simple to use and provides easy to understand analysis of key sales performance metrics.
dislike: Some of the navigation is not always intuitive and reports need to be custom-built.
problems solved: Kluster provides a critical view of sales performance metrics, enabling me to track improvement and monitor the impact of changes to our sales and GTM motions. It also helps drive more consistency and visibility in forecasting, resulting in better business performance.

like:
Kluster is a game-changer for RevOps and Commercial Leadership. Not only will you improve your forecasting accuracy, but you'll clearly see why and where you might miss goals, so that you can act quickly. I especially like that individuals can easily see how incremental KPI improvements can influence performance. This makes for more effective 1-2-1 conversations with managers and helps identify training gaps.
The team at Kluster is super helpful and will always do their utmost to help you get the best out of the product. Just a great bunch of people with a brilliant product!
dislike: No dislikes, other than that, this tool will highlight issues with your CRM processes. This isn't a negative, but it does mean you'll need to get your house in order!
problems solved: Better forecasting accuracy and making sales metrics actionable can be a challenge without the right tools. The business often relies on unruly spreadsheets or, worse, doesn't use the valuable data available. Kluster helps resolve this by making the metrics readable and actionable. And all reporting is automated!

like: To be honest, I'm not the most organized rep so having Kluster pull all my sales data into one place is super helpful. It also save me a ton of time putting together forecasts each week for my manager. It take like 2-3 clicks and I'm done - and that's easily visible to the right people.
dislike: It sometimes takes a bit too long to pull the sales data from our CRM into the platform but at most that is like 15mins. -First-world problems. Overall it's been great though!
problems solved:
The problems that I'm solving are: saving a ton of time with creating forecasting reports, and having all of my quarterly/monthly deals in one place.

Kluster also has great reporting which allows me to understand what factors accelerate or decelerate my deals.

like: Kluster has an extensive repository of metrics and charts right out of the box... everything on my requirement list was readily available, as well several things I wish I had initially put on my requirement list.  Aside from the product my account team is the best.  I can't say enough good things about doing business with Kluster, in general.
dislike: Nothing.  Everything I have asked for, I have been able to get and their product roadmap includes more enhancements than I could ask for - they are one step ahead!  The team is fast to respond, despite the time zone differences (East Coast vs. London)
problems solved: We use Kluster for forecasting and reporting/dashboards.  It has given the teams a clear view of their business and can be used to support our broader team calls and 1:1 coaching sessions.  The link with SFDC helps us avoid any reconciliation exercises because we all start with the same dataset, and it matches SFDC.

like: The graphs are easy to review and contain a lot of data
dislike: I can not change the filters myself and need to rely on rep
problems solved: Monthly manager meeting regarding ARR spends etc. Better than the SFDC dashboard and more pleasing to report.  Info being sliced in different ways is super helpful.

like: It's genuinely a tool for all revenue professions - from the greenest AE to the most seasoned CRO. By providing actionable insights to the feet on the street on their own unique behaviours and pipeline, it turns the tool from yet-another-thing-i-have-to-fill-out-for-the-higher-ups to something they want to look at and use as they plan their days, weeks, quarters, and year out. At the top, the CRO can have insights into why the numbers are changing and the Kluster smarts behind the scenes help blend rep behaviour with actual past performance (since we all know that reps are perfect at always keeping a clean and accurate pipeline...).
dislike: Nothing so far - still working through a review.
problems solved: I would love to have this help with forecasting into what can often be a short sales cycle, and to help our teams to understand the impact of their activity (taking into account their personal conversion rates).

like:
I work as an account executive. Kluster allows me to study my pipeline, my conversion rate and the length of the sales cycle.

Kluster also allows me to compare these KPIs with colleagues doing the same job.
dislike:
Not much,I find the platform very fun and intuitive.
If you have any questions, the support is very responsive.
Kluster gives a good overview of the current situation.
problems solved: Kluster is useful on a daily basis for forecasting, pipeline management, creating and managing sales targets. It also allows us to know our weaknesses, to know where we can improve, is the pipeline sufficient? Are the deals getting signed quickly enough?

like:
On a daily basis, Kluster helps us to forecast effectively and accurately.
As an AE, Kluster gives me clear visibility on where I'm at in terms of closing, on my pipeline, and the gaps with my quotas.
dislike: Not much, even if the analysis of the open deals could be a bit more customizable to be adapted to different situations and use cases.
problems solved:
All AE are now on the same page in terms of forecasting and reporting and this is super valuable for the management.
It helps us to get clear visibility and to be aligned as a team saving a lot of time.

like:
Kluster helps me check my forecasts to make sure that what I am presenting to my manager is accurate.
It also keeps me honest about not holding onto deals too long that are plodding and need to be closed lost.
dislike: As a first time user, at the moment nothing
problems solved:
I found forecasting off Hubspot clunky, and now I do it all through Kluster. My manager uses it, so I know we are on the same page.
I have become harder on myself when forecasting, and although at times my number is lowered its now more accurate.

like: Be able to analyze my deals clearly - super useful
dislike: How slow the system can be sometimes, should be faster to load
problems solved: Having a clear view of how I am performing against my target and what kind of deal I am winning

like: That it syncs with Salesforce but is easier to see everything that I have going on this month
dislike: Takes a bit too long to sync with Salesforce (sometimes up to 20-30 mins).
problems solved: I'm able to see where my focus needs to be at any given moment which has allowed me to be more productive and hopefully has contributed to my closing more deals as well.

like: Support, weekly call with Tom. Always able to ask questions and get an update.
dislike: Control - but new featured coming.  To be able to change parameters.
problems solved: Reporting for monthly manager meeting

like: It saves time, and is cleaner to see 1) what i need to do, 2) what my manager is seeing
dislike: its not fully synced with our CRM so not everything shows up - might be an issue on our side on the intergation
problems solved: Easier forecasting meetings with my team and manager - and faster overviews for myself (which timelines are coming up, what and where to clean up my pipeline). Also great for my QBR and personal goal setting

like: It shows me what opps are realistic, opportunity creations, commit, vs. best case. it makes submitting forecasts easy
dislike: Sometimes Kluster can be a bit harsh when an opportunity is discounted or changed in scope. Tulip's deal often change from the initial conversation.
problems solved: I have figured out what my typical forecasts should be. tracked how my pipeline grows overtime and especially where I am generating opportunities from

like: I like the ability to see historical information about deals, as well as determine which deals have a higher likelihood of closing based on industry. We can use this information for our prospecting efforts by identifying our low hanging fruit.
dislike: (This is not a Kluster issue) - lack of good information in CRMs means we cannot glean as many insights, and I think there could be navigational improvements to help find information more easily. I find that the platform is not designed intuitively.
problems solved: Identifying commonalities with our successful deals so that we can be more focused in our efforts and identify deals that are at risk sooner to help keep our forecast as accurate as possible

like: I have been using Kluster for the last eight months and have been very impressed so far. I particularly like being able to see what deals are at risk.
dislike: I can't think of anything I don't like about it. Does what it needs to!
problems solved: Having my risk deals highlighted enables me to action them quickly or take them out of my forecast. This helps me to be more accurate when it comes to QBR time!

like:
Kluster highlighted areas within our business and sales process that we weren't currently tracking. This helped highlight risk or trends throughout each stage of our sales cycle so that we could make more informed decisions, quicker.

The team are incredibly hands on, helpful and go over and above to advise on the most impactful parts of the platform for your business, and promote thoughtful conversation about the areas you may not be aware are holding you back. I certainly didn't!!

You can tell right from the C-suite  through sales and product you're a partner with them not a number and can even suggest input that gets immediate recognition.
dislike: Not so much a dislike but it's worth spending the extra session to get a deep dive into why each graphic matters and what it's really showing, so that you know how to effectively take action on the information.
problems solved:
Better forecasting to the business, highlighting areas of risk within each deal, identifying opportunities across the team's pipeline to press.
Reviewing performance over time and looking into why we've overperformed or underperformed.
Reps become more accountable for their pipeline management and get better visibility on the actions required in their deals.

like: Kluster takes some advanced reporting and insights and makes pulling them easy. If you really need to step up from your basic CRM reports, Kluster is the easy button to get you there.
dislike: Not much to dislike. It's easy to use and pulls data directly from you CRM for realtime insight.
problems solved: Kluster has given us some awesome leading metrics to help us predict future success.

like: Being able to see the health of my pipeline and be able to forecast to my manager accurately.
dislike: Only that I don't have it in my other roles
problems solved: Pipeline visibility, accurate forecasting

like: The UI, I am a visual learner so having a clear and visual representation of pipeline makes it really easy to follow.
dislike: Could be me, but seems to take a long time to update from Salesforce e.g. the red, green and amber dots for deal health are sometimes inaccurate.
problems solved: Effective time management.

like: The dashboard functionality giving me full insight into pipeline and performance. This enables me to spot the gaps and plan accordingly
dislike: The refresh time when pulling from SFDC could be faster
problems solved: Pipeline visibility and reporting. It enables me to have oversight as well as easily report upwards

like: The weighted pipeline gives me a true reflection of the propensity of my deals to close.
dislike: There are potentially too many data points
problems solved: Not having a top line view on pipeline value and my gut feeling on where i'll finish at the end of the q

like: It's a comprehensive application and can be effective for bigger deals.
dislike: It's overkill for small deal sizes. The dashboard has a ton of information.
problems solved: Pipeline analysis

like: As a sales manager, Kluster is a great tool to help me manage my team forecast more effectively and, therefore, give our leadership team a more predictable revenue. The platform also helps with one-to-one's, examing individual pipelines and more efficient ways to create strategies based on facts.
dislike: I wouldn't say there were any dislikes with this platform
problems solved: The problems Kluster solves are many, in particular for me, forecasting, pipeline management, creating, and managing sales targets.

like: Kluster has proven very valuable for us to be able to understand our sales function in much more detail, helping us improve our performance across teams and verticals. Especially our understanding of our per rep sales metrics and where each can work to improve which has seen our average deals size almost double in some cases and time to close shorten to half the previous.
dislike: It's still a fairly new company and some admin work is required but their CS team responds within the hour to help adjust or fix what I can't myself. But I know that's being worked on and not something that should discourage anyone.
problems solved: It really helped us to understand where we can improve and take measures to boost our business and achieve our goals.

like: Easy connection to Salesforce with some great visuals. Great technical support and onboarding. Intuitive to use from Manager to Sales Rep
dislike: There hasn't been anything major. As it pulls in Salesforce data you will just need to ensure that you have your reports set up correctly to make it the most accurate
problems solved: We had a complex org structure that could not be used with Salesforce's org structure and made out of the box forecasting hard. We needed a tool that would be easy for everyone to Forecast as well as provide the team the right insight in what we are doing

like:
Comprehensive forecasting and pipeline management with deep diving insights that allow you to take action at a company, team, and rep level.

Spot early warning signs in the pipeline and forecast more accurately at every level of the business. It will also help track and improve the four sales levers of average sales cycle length, win rate, average deal size and optimum no. of opportunities to manage. Helps us understand if we have enough pipeline of the right composition for future periods, to achieve predictable booking patterns.

Leveraged by everyone from SDR, AE, AM, CS all the way up to CCO and CEO - the visibility and data it provides to take action is excellent. 'Kluster Vision' allows reps to know what needs addressing in real-time, that level of actionability is rare

Kluster refreshingly drive innovation through idea generation that stems from their Kluster community, all their clients providing real-time feedback and suggested improvements. Got an idea? They'll make it happen.

Kluster is the real deal. GWI (and my previous company) have subscribed for the last 5 years, it's the tool I renew year after year ahead of all others.
dislike:
Limited.

Some of the interfaces/visuals aren't quite as slick as other platform tools. I guess this comes second to prioritising the value it aims to bring to their clients
problems solved:
Forecast accuracy
Spotting early warnings
121 coaching
Improve sales efficiencies and behaviours

like:
Kluster's predictive AI provides great guidance to our sales team, improving our forecast accuracy and helping us clear out aging pipeline.

Kluster has top-notch customer service, and is always working for us. We have weekly catch-ups with our CSM, and when we need bespoke work done, Kluster never hesitates to help us quickly deliver solutions.

Similarly, we're able to benefit from other reporting and dashboards from the Kluster community. Kluster's offering is growing with us.
dislike:
Kluster focuses mostly on in-period forecasting, where our sales leaders would prefer an annual view.

However, Kluster is helping us build this out, so this problem will be resolved soon and will be available to the community.
problems solved:
We solved a problem with a matrixed reporting structure in our Sales org, as Kluster is able to configure this in the backend in a way that tools like standard Salesforce forecasting could not.

With Kluster, our rate of delivering analytics has increased rapidly.

Our forecast accuracy has shot up, as well as our adoption of Kluster as a forecasting and analytics tool.

like: Predictive forecasting, team KPIs, dashboards
dislike: There is nothing about Klister that I dislike
problems solved:
I am able to better predict not only the health of my pipeline but also predict where my team will end up at the end of the month. This enables me to quickly identify if we are behind in the month and address any shortfalls.
The Interactive dashboard helps me to report to key stakeholders within my business more efficiently and effectively.
Having the ability to set KPIs for individual team members based on their historical performance is a game changer.

like:
As a relatively small team, we don't yet have a dedicated Rev Ops function. Kluster is an essential part of our toolkit that allows us to get all the insights we need without a dedicated team.

Currently, on their start-up package, the parts of the tool we currently use are relatively basic but are incredibly valuable as we start to scale. From the conversations I've had with the CS team, I'm pretty excited to get to the stage where we're ready to make the most of the more advanced features.

I'd recommend Kluster to any small sales team who feel they don't have the time and/or expertise to get the most out of the data available to them.
dislike:
Not really their fault, but when we first started looking at Kluster we realised pretty quickly that our CRM data integrity wasn't really good enough.

Definitely make sure that your team is using SFDC properly so that the data going into the tool is as good as it can be.
problems solved: Analyzing our pipeline, showing us what's rubbish and what's actually good. Loss analysis showing us which bits of our sales process are the weakest. They are providing more accurate forecasting than we had previously.

like: The customer service and knowledge of Tom and Pete
dislike: The dashboards can be complex to read and understand
problems solved: The visibility of pipeline for the quarter/year so sales leaders can plan ahead

like:
It's straightforward to use. The display of data is clear and concise. It integrates easily with Salesforce, and the insights it provides are incredibly valuable to everyone involved in not only the Sales org, but Marketing and Customer as well.

Kluster works very well with its customers, asking for constant feedback and ways to innovate and improve. Any issues (rare) are dealt with quickly.
dislike: Nothing at the moment. Would be interesting to see how the tool can take data from other sources, such as content and learning systems.
problems solved: We are to clearly and concisely see our sales data for opportunities, making it very easy to see how we track compared to target, but also quickly identify if there may be an issues which can be addressed early.

like: The product is incredibly easy to use and to adopt in sales teams. But the one thing that does stand out is the world class support. The Kluster team have been brilliant in helping to shape our Kluster instance to our specific business needs.
dislike: Nothing to dislike so far - Kluster has been great!
problems solved: Forecasting, pipeline management, data integrity, tracking/monitoring key metrics and KPI's, sales velocity, board reporting. We have seen huge benefits in using Kluster in all these areas. I seldom log into Salesforce now - all the data I need to drive growth is in Kluster!

like: The forecasting predictability is pretty amazing and I get insights in one place for our business.
dislike: At this time I haven't found limitations with Kluster. In fact, the team has be incredibly responsive to our needs and suggestions. Being in the enterprise software space for 20 years, you just don't see that anymore and we value our engagement with the Kluster team.
problems solved: Forecasting accuracy, deal inspection insights, nice visualization of our data movements

like:
The product gives me a snapshot of salesforce every 15mins. If anything moves at any stage, I can see the changes immediately.
It has some predictive analytics based on history, which are useful
It has saved me a tremendous amount of time every day
dislike: Nothing yet, It seems good so far. We are only a couple of weeks in
problems solved: Better forecast visibility, better pipeline velocity

like: I love that everything I could need is right at my fingertips. I never have to look far for information I need at any given moment and am actually more regularly being directed to things I wouldn't have picked up on without Kluster. Their team is so helpful and supportive - they feel like an extension of our team. Can't recommend them highly enough!
dislike: No major red flags. They are constantly working on new product and evolving which comes with teething pains, but everything is moving in the right direction, and quickly!
problems solved: Trends quarter over quarter, red flags, positive impacts of specific campaigns, stagnating pipeline, patterns in rep productivity.

like: I love how dynamic they are as an organisation but also the out-of-the-box insights!
dislike: It doesnt have a self-serve admin portal.
problems solved:
We are solving many problems including:
- Forecasting
- Key KPI tracking
- Just in time analytics
- Performance management
- etc.

like: Easy to navigate, valuable insights and a great team to work with
dislike: I cannot fault the product from my usage thus far
problems solved: We have been able to create consistent scalable forecasting across our global org, with access to intelligent and predictable insights to guide our sales organisation

like: Customer support is second to none, they have become an extension of my team.
dislike: Most downsides are directly tended to by Kluster in an efficient manner.
problems solved: Forecasting visibility, pipeline inspection, rep behavior, and hitting the number! Allowed by team in Sales Ops to scale without adding resources.

like:
Pipeline reporting. In particular the pipeline change, coverage, conversion, and capacity reports. They help me see and plan for how much and what type of pipeline is needed entering and during a period.
Their support is fantastic. Easily the best support I've had from any tool I've ever used.
dislike: Filtering by multiple criteria is challenging
problems solved: Main challenges in solving with Kluster are pipeline planning, future quarter forecasting, and funnel conversions. A couple of things I've used it for is to help guide rep coaching conversions on where deals get stuck, and see future quarter gaps early, giving more time to solve for them
